update tb_user
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PLATFORM_ID = #{record.platformId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`TYPE` = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR},
`STATUS` = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR},
GRP_CD = #{record.grpCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEM_CD = #{record.memCd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ROLE = #{record.userRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

BARCODE = #{record.barcode,jdbcType=CHAR},
USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`PASSWORD` = #{record.password,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.jc.pico.utils.mybatis.typehandler.PasswordSecurityTypeHandler},
`NAME` = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_NAME = #{record.firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MID_NAME = #{record.midName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_NAME = #{record.lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MB = #{record.mb,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.jc.pico.utils.mybatis.typehandler.MobileSecurityTypeHandler},
MB_BK = #{record.mbBk,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.jc.pico.utils.mybatis.typehandler.MobileSecurityTypeHandler},
TEL_COUNTRY_CD = #{record.telCountryCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX_COUNTRY_CD = #{record.faxCountryCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{record.fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{record.gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=CHAR},
COUNTRY = #{record.country,jdbcType=CHAR},
REGION = #{record.region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{record.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR1 = #{record.addr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR2 = #{record.addr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP = #{record.zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN = #{record.lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_TRY_TM = #{record.loginTryTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_FAIL_CNT = #{record.loginFailCnt,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_MB_AUTH = #{record.isMbAuth,jdbcType=BIT},
MB_AUTH_TM = #{record.mbAuthTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_EMAIL_AUTH = #{record.isEmailAuth,jdbcType=BIT},
EMAIL_AUTH_TM = #{record.emailAuthTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_SVC_SMS = #{record.isSvcSms,jdbcType=BIT},
IS_SVC_PUSH = #{record.isSvcPush,jdbcType=BIT},
IS_SVC_BLUETOOTH = #{record.isSvcBluetooth,jdbcType=BIT},
LAST_BEACON_PUSH = #{record.lastBeaconPush,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SEC_TOKEN = #{record.secToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{record.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED = #{record.updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
